technology.short_description: Hearts pound like war drums, veins burn with primal fire, sinews tighten into iron, and the rage, oh the rage, is transcendent in its intensity. Such endless, glorious slaughter there shall be!

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% for Blood Hosts
	(all characters factionwide)
Campaign movement range: +10% after razing a settlement

technology.short_description: Hate is our armour. Fury is our shield. Rage is our bulwark. Magic? Pah! It is worthless trickery that shall never, ever dim our Daemons' limitless and eternal wrath.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 15% for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units

technology.short_description: None may refuse the call of slaughter, for it is the call of glory, honour, destiny and destruction.

effects.description: The Skull Throne cost: -10%
Army ability number of uses: +1 for "Summoned from Beyond"

technology.short_description: Do not lose heart, for failure is a but an opportunity to grow stronger, and thus another stepping stone to glory. There will, after all, always be more blood to spill.

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from Bloodthirst attrition

technology.short_description: The intoxicating thrill of savage victory shall become headier than ever, and our thirst for the kill will know no bounds. Praise the Skull Throne!

effects.description: Army ability: "Relentless Rage"

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

technology.short_description: Slice the throats of the runts, and let their superior brethren feast upon their corpses. Only the largest, strongest and most quick-tempered of breeding stock may be permitted to join Khorne's blood legion.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +3 for Gorebeast Chariot and Chaos Chariot of Khorne units
Armour: +10 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
Melee defence: +4 for Gorebeast Chariot and Chaos Chariot of Khorne units

technology.short_description: As magic, the tool of weaklings and deceivers, is anathema to the will of Khorne, so too do our war-beasts despise all sorcery. As the accursed Winds blow, their ferocity shall only grow.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Charge bonus: +10 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne
Attribute: Strider for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

technology.short_description: The merest scent of carnage shall rouse our Doombulls into a frenzied rage â€“ perfect killing machines without mercy or restraint, a sight to awe even the most battle-weary of Daemons.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Goregreed" for Minotaur units (replaces Bloodgreed)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

technology.short_description: Let our murderous legion reach a rapturous crescendo of slaughter â€“ an unprecedented symphony of destruction, a brand new zenith of murderous fury.

effects.description: Army ability: "Blade of Khorne"

technology.short_description: As their blood boils with eternal murder-lust, our Juggers will become living engines of destruction, their incandescent rage rendering them immune to fear or exhaustion.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +10 for Skullcrushers of Khorne units
Missile resistance: 10% for Skullcrushers of Khorne units

technology.short_description: No gods! No kings! Only Khorne! It is in His name that we wage our eternal war upon order, and it is by His grace that we shall be granted the tools of triumph.

effects.description: The Skull Throne cost: -10%
Army ability number of uses: +1 for "Summoned from Beyond"

technology.short_description: Peace is the greatest of insults to the servants of blood. Indeed, a true champion of Khorne can refuse no battle, and will willingly move mountains to join the gore-soaked fray.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10% for Blood Hosts
Campaign movement range: +5% after winning a battle
Campaign movement range: +15% after razing a settlement

technology.short_description: When brothers in blood go to war against one another, it will be a fight like no other. There is no foe more pitiless, no foe more brutal, than our own kin.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Khornate factions
Double experience gain for units when fighting against Khornate factions

technology.short_description: The stone-faced mortals of Kislev possess uncommon endurance, but even their steel will shatter beneath our pounding hooves and lacerating blades.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +100% when fighting against Empire
Charge bonus: +30% when fighting against Kislev

technology.short_description: Fight with courage, slay only worthy foes, and the Lord of Murder shall be your shield in the glorious battles to come.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units
Melee attack: +10 for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Fear not the subterfuge of cowards. Their shameful blades shall break against our hides, for our righteous rage is all the armour we require.

effects.description: Ambush defence chance: +50%

technology.short_description: An ocean of hatred! A flood of fury! A spreading sea of purest rage and unbound wrath! All must hear the call to slaughter!

effects.description: Khorne corruption: +2
+5% chance to automatically colonise ruined regions in province at turn start

technology.short_description: If we are to triumph upon every battlefield, if we are to bathe in the blood of our every enemy, we must lure legendary warriors beyond compare to our murderous cause. Put out the call!

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Experience gain: +10% for characters
Lord recruit rank: +2
Leadership aura size: +25%

technology.short_description: Steadfast belief in our skills and our tools of war guarantees greater tribute. The more we value our own prowess in battle, the more fresh skulls there shall be.

effects.description: Skulls collected from skull piles: +200%
Weapon strength: +10% for Marauders, Warriors, Knights and Chosen of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Let the bodies pile up, let the land run red with blood, let the scars accumulate upon our hides, and then, only then, will the Lord of Murder show His approval.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Blood Hosts

items.colour_text: This grisly keepsake is a small skull that constantly weeps blood, but the recipient will always have the Blood Godâ€™s approval.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8
	(assigned unit)

Melee defence: +8
	(assigned unit)

Charge bonus: +10%
	(assigned unit)

Passive ability: "Dauntless Fury"
	(assigned unit)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

technology.short_description: The Skull Throne's Greater Daemons are wrath incarnate, pure fury made corporeal. As our blood legion's lethal rage swells and swells, ever more Deathbringers shall join their axes to ours.

effects.description: Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Bloodthirster units
Weapon strength: +25% for Bloodthirster units

technology.short_description: Wherever there is hatred, wherever there is fury, a red door is opened. Through it strides Kharneth's baying legion of butchers, summoned into being by unchecked resentment, conflict and disorder.

effects.description: Control: +2
Blood Hosts: +1 units on creation

technology.short_description: Cowards that they are, the meddling Raven's mutants will deploy sorcery and trickery against us. Fortunately, there is no magic that can drive the scent of blood from our nostrils.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Elves
Spell resistance: 25% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

technology.short_description: Not one inch of Kharneth's ground can be lost. The harder our foe strikes against us, the more unwavering our courage shall be.

effects.description:
Defensive supplies: +2000
	(all regions factionwide)
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 when defending

technology.short_description: Though carnage is its own reward, if offered sufficient tribute the Skull Throne may on occasion grant unto us great tools of destruction. Our fury shall be augmented by legendary steel.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +10%

technology.short_description: Those who give themselves, body and soul, to the fury within shall never again require sustenance or reward. Hunger, thirst, desire, avarice â€“ they will be liberated from such petty concerns. Only hatred shall remain.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, and Chaos Knights of Khorne units
Armour: +10 for Marauders of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Let the bone bounty pour forth, for every harvested skull is a paean to the glory of war, and to the immortal might of the Murder God.

effects.description: Income from all buildings: +10%

technology.short_description: Even the mindless cannot resist the drums of war. And even the most wretched and broken of beings can call upon the might of Kharneth, if it serves slaughter's cause.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Spawn of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Spawn of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
Weapon strength: +10% for Spawn of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units

technology.short_description: As we gaze upon lands riven by bloodshed and hatred, our hearts swell with pride, knowing that we have served the Hunter of Souls well.

effects.description: Control: +1 for every concurrent war with a neighbouring faction
Blood Hosts: +1 units on creation

technology.short_description: It is our unshakeable self-belief, not mere flesh, which sustains the hordes of Kharneth. Shrug off all wounds! Do not flinch at lost limbs or gored organs!

effects.description: Blood Hosts: +1 turns to initial Bloodthirst attrition immunity
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Bloodletters of Khorne units

technology.short_description: No matter how many foes' bones we blunt our blades upon, there can be no complacency, no final moment of triumph. We must forever prove that our skill, and our fury, is unmatched.

effects.description: The Skull Throne cost: -10%
Army ability number of uses: +1 for "Summoned from Beyond"

technology.short_description: It is spirit and skill, not the physical limitations of brass and bone, that govern the murderous wrath of our Hellforged Bellowers. Let them be fused with our Bloodletters' unholy purpose, and they will maim and slay like never before.

effects.description: Range: +30% for Skullcannon units

technology.short_description: So many bodies rended. So many skulls harvested. Our furious deeds shall birth a great storm of wrath, to rain down upon every soul in every land. All shall heed the Blood God's call!

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -25 with all factions
Control: -2 in enemy provinces where an army is present
Weapon strength: +10% for melee infantry units

technology.short_description: The slain Daemon imprisoned within every Soul Grinder rages to return to their physical form, but only though copious slaughter can this come to pass. Let us aid our Clinkerspawns' cause by granting them furious new might.

effects.description: Armour-piercing missile damage: +25 for Soul Grinders of Khorne
Ammunition: +10% for Soul Grinder of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Life, in all its meekness and indulgence, is an affront to the God of Murder! Life must be refused! Life must be destroyed!

items.colour_text: A banner said to leech the very essence of life from enemies close by.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8
	(assigned unit)

Melee defence: +8
	(assigned unit)

Weapon strength: +8%
	(assigned unit)

Charge bonus: +25%
	(assigned unit)

Charge bonus: +8
	(assigned unit)

Physical resistance: 8%
	(assigned unit)

technology.short_description: Refuse all need! Refuse all want! These are the worthless concerns of mortals. The honour of proving ourselves before Khorne is the only sustenance we require.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10%
	(own armies factionwide in enemy territory)

technology.short_description: The mortal brutes are powerful indeed, with might to rival our own, but in knowing they face this deadliest of challenges, the blood legion will excel.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Ogres and Lizardmen
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Ogre Kingdoms

technology.short_description: No longer will the hated Dragon Emperor impede Kharneth's bloody crusade! We will march through his volleys and fusillades as if they were nothing!

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Dwarfs
Bonus vs Large: +10 when fighting against Cathay
Bonus vs Large: +5 when fighting against Bretonnia
Missile resistance: 10% when fighting against Cathay

technology.short_description: Let them come. Let them try. We will not be bowed! We will not be broken! We will remain steadfast, always!

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25% when under siege
Vigour loss reduction: -15% during siege battles
Armour: +10 when under siege

technology.short_description: The Blood God approves of the great and glorious battles we fight in His name. He shall grant unto us His mightiest warriors, borne atop His most fearsome beasts.

effects.description: Experience gain: +10% for units
Recruit rank: +2
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Destruction alone will not suffice. We are not animals! We are crusaders, driven by fury and fervour in equal measure, and we will exact the tribute that great Kharneth is due.

effects.description: Income from raiding: +50%

technology.short_description: Some believe we simply rejoice in destruction, and do not understand that it is undiluted hatred that drives us on. As we sup upon their lifeblood by the gallon, howling to the skies, all will know the truth.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Blood Hosts

items.colour_text: The hungry servants who feast under this banner are blessed with an eternal craving.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Strength From Flesh"
	(assigned unit)

technology.short_description: As the Blood God's brass throne room fills to the ceiling with freshly-harvested skulls, we will unleash rage to shake this world to its very core! As awe-struck as they are terrified, all will quail before our everlasting fury!

effects.description: Skulls: 50 per turn
Diplomatic relations: -10 with all factions

technology.short_description: We will dig trophies from the ashes, seize wealth from the ruins, tear trinkets from the corpses, and then we will know the Skull Throne's approval for these blood-soaked tributes.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +25%

technology.short_description: Only once this world is scrubbed clean of the decadent Slaaneshi can it know honour. It is our great privilege to slaughter the Perfect Prince's venal fools, and a responsibility we shall never shirk.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

technology.short_description: Our beasts of battle shall fear no foe, no matter how great or how unnatural. A kill is a kill, and flesh is flesh. The more of it there is, the more there is to rip and tear.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +10 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne and Chaos Warhounds units
Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies units

technology.short_description: Our great deeds attract the attention of a great warrior â€“ a scar-cloaked and blood-soaked champion of Kharneth. With this legend of warfare at our side, unprecedented new heights of glory await us.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for all units in Blood Hosts
Melee attack: +10% for all units in Blood Hosts

technology.short_description: The slaughter has been glorious, our skill has been unmatched, and the pride we take in each fresh kill has never been greater. We are deserving of tribute.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Blood Hosts

items.colour_text: A carnal prize, the bloody trophy for Khorneâ€™s greatest killers.

effects.description:
Attribute: Perfect Vigour
	(assigned unit)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description:
Attribute: Unbreakable
	(assigned unit)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

technology.short_description: Believe in victory, and victory shall come to pass. Believe that we will be showered in the skulls of the fallen, and we will be showered in the skulls of the fallen. Believe in Lord Khorne, for He believes in us.

effects.description: Skulls: 50 per turn
The Skull Throne cost: -10%

technology.short_description: Should one of our bloodthirsty kin fall in battle, simply step across their corpse and slay their killer, knowing that ever more of Khorne's Daemons stand behind us. The Blood Lord provides, always!

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units
Recruitment cost: -10% for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units

technology.short_description: The Feet of Khorne will not succumb to the agony of fire. They will thrive upon it! Our Soulcrushers will be forged anew in the scorching flames, battle-frenzied and unstoppable!

effects.description: Fire resistance: 50% for Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
Speed: +10% for Bloodcrushers of Khorne units

technology.short_description: Raw hunks of gore bring the Skull Throne only meagre satisfaction. Our Daemons must become artisans of butchery, harvesting pristine and undamaged skulls from their foes' mutilated' corpses.

effects.description: Skulls collected from skull piles: +50%
Skulls gained from kills: +10%

technology.short_description: Death is no obstacle to bloodlust, for Khornate fury is immortal. Those Daemons slain in glorious battle shall swiftly be reborn, hungry for savage vengeance.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%

technology.short_description: So consumed by ferocity shall our horde be that all rest will forever be denied to them. For every moment of their furious existence, they will think only of the next kill.

effects.description: Blood Hosts: Guaranteed chance of receiving +1 Bloodthirsters unit(s) on creation

technology.short_description: Wrath brings war. War brings death. Death brings skulls. Skulls bring glory. Thus: skulls for the Skull Throne! Skulls for the Skull Throne! Skulls for the Skull Throne!

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Skulls collected from skull piles: +25%
Skulls gained from kills: +50%

technology.short_description: No weapon nor any spell of destruction can slow the Blood God's greatest warriors, for they simply refuse pain. Wounds are for the weak! The strong fight on, always.

effects.description: Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Bloodthirster units
Ward save: 10% for Bloodthirster units

technology.short_description: Defeat is impossible! Victory is inevitable! The Skull Throne expects, and we shall not disappoint! When the killing is done, we shall bathe in glory. But, of course, the killing is never doneâ€¦

effects.description: Blood Hosts +1 turns to Bloodthirst attrition immunity from battles

technology.short_description: When our foes strike like cowards from afar, the Hunter of Souls expects that we simply rebuff their craven fusillades. Then, our wrath undimmed, we close for the kill.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% when attacking

technology.short_description: Those mortals who have sold their souls to Ruin believe themselves to be the equal of Daemons. When they lie writhing on the battlefield, blood pouring from their wounds, they will know the truth.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

technology.short_description: No disease, no matter how foul, can survive the scorching flames of Kharneth's rage. As we rend these festering wretches limb from limb, we shall burn all taint from them.

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -25%
Enables flaming attacks when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

technology.short_description: It matters not what undeserved gifts this fallen mortal has stolen from the Gods. We will simply carve a path through whatever horrors he dares arrays against us.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 when fighting against Daemon Prince
Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Daemon Prince
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Beastmen
Bonus vs Large: +5 when fighting against Daemon Prince

technology.short_description: Courage, honour and unchecked ferocity: these are the virtues to which we all must aspire. Let us summon forth great champions of carnage to show our lesser forces the way.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +4
Hero capacity: +2 for all Heroes
Hero capacity: +1 for Bloodreapers
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Bloodreapers

technology.short_description: Wherever there is fear, there can be no honour. The solution is simple: remove all fear, and only courage shall remain.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes
Charge bonus: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes

Passive ability: "Dauntless Fury"
	(all characters factionwide)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

technology.short_description: Every wound a triumph! Every scar a trophy! Every fresh gouge a mark of honour! Shrug off the blade's bite, and know the heat of battle once more!

effects.description:
Hit points: +10%
	(all characters factionwide)

Wound recovery time: -2
	(all characters factionwide)
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Cooldown: -10% to "Rage of the Blood God"

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to "Chosen of Khorne"

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active
